dialogue.utterance: Hello how are you tonight?
Im doing well how are you
Excellent thanks - I just spent the day with my Aunt Lennox at the Art and Science Museum downtown.
cool. .. I have to go there.. how was it
Great - that had a lot of trendy exhibits - they had one where it was a painting of all faces, and another that was depicting the ideal woman
thats awesome... did you have a favorite
We were able to stay for a few hours and spoke to a few artists as well who were there discussing their work
Honestly - it was the discussion with the artists themselves - it opened my eyes to a whole new perspective
That is so cool
how so
Well, just how you see the art, I always looked at like a picture and they explained the deeper meanings
did you take any good pictures?
I was happy to be there with my Aunt also - we had a photo taken of us outside - you can see how happy we were
Check it out
That looks wonderful

dialogue.utterance: Tex-Mex is one of the best cuisines out there since you get the  best of American and Mexican!
dialogue.speaker: Roshonda

dialogue.utterance: Yes.  I have a friend who owns and Tex-Mex stand.  Do you also work in the business, or just one who loves to eat the food?
dialogue.speaker: Montie

dialogue.utterance: I just love the food, especially the flour tortillas and cheese!  The spice is great too.
dialogue.speaker: Roshonda

dialogue.utterance: Since its my friend, I don't know a lot about all the specifics that go into the stand.  What types of spices are used in the Tex-Mex biz?
dialogue.speaker: Montie

dialogue.utterance: There are a lot of spicy spices like cumin and chili.  The salsa and guacamole also adds a nice taste to the different dishes.
dialogue.speaker: Roshonda

dialogue.utterance: Chips and salsa are my favorite.  I'm not so much of a fan of the guac kind.  But, my wife loves that.  What spices and flavors do you enjoy?
dialogue.speaker: Montie

dialogue.utterance: I love the all the flavors together but fresh corn, beans and tomatoes on tortillas is a wonderful thing,  Does your friend ever give you discounts?
dialogue.speaker: Roshonda

dialogue.utterance: Yes.  In fact, he often gives us free food.  He and I went to college together.  He's a great guy; takes care of his family.  Do you have any particular Tex-Mex restaurants that are your favorite?
dialogue.speaker: Montie

dialogue.utterance: Yes, Chevys Fresh Mex was so good when it was around and I love going to Houston for the local restaurants.
dialogue.speaker: Roshonda

dialogue.utterance: I hear the Houston restaurants are the best for Tex-Mex.  Is that true?
dialogue.speaker: Montie

dialogue.utterance: Hello
Hello!
Yesterday, I went to a conference with my co-worker. It was fun!
That's great! What was the conference about?
It was about fashion. New styles that will be realeased later this year.
Super fun.
It was a lot of fun! And at the end of the night, they gave us free drinks.
Did you go for work or just for fun?
I had red wine and my friend had a beer.
No. My boss chose us to go on the trip with her to gain new ideas for our company.
What a compliment!
I wish my boss would do things like that!
Yes my boss is excellent, and I am very grateful for her. I hope we can return next year.
How long have you worked there?
I have worked there for 3 years
Nice!
Thanks, I really love my job.
This is my friend and I at the conference
I like your earrings!
You'll have to crop out the photobomber haha!
Yes we will, I really love this pic

So good to hear!

Here's the pic.
Hmmm, my photo won't attach.
Time flies
There we go. Isn't he a cutie?1
He is so handsome! I cannot believe how grown up he looks.

I am doing fine just a little bit too hot today

Man I had no idea you guys went out to the lake

You usually take pictures

Hahaha I will bring him a long dont worry about that

Man he really has gotten older
im also getting old hahaha
Anyway im going to let you have more fun without distractions
He is still a sweetheart and such a kind child. I know second grade, I can't believe it.
Lets go to the lake together next time

Want me to guess?
I'll give you a hint...it has something to do with my terrible cooking skills...
I'll give you a hint....it has something to do with my terrible cooking skills....
You are in the kitchen to cook dinner for your family. Are you making Chinese food tonight?

Wow, that sounds delicious! Definitely save me some leftovers. This cooking instructor is really inspiring me to work on my knife skills.
Look at him work!
I will make little bit more for you. Wow, your instructor is really a master. Do you think that you will acquire his skills in 2-3 sessions?
Man, I wish. I feel like with my current skills, it'll probably be more like 20 sessions haha! Wish me luck!

dialogue.utterance: Italian cuisine.. I wish my father liked it more, so I could eat it more growing up. But now as a free adult, I've been really getting into it, making my own dishes, etc... It has so much taste, which makes it one of the most popular and copied cuisines in the world for good reason.
dialogue.speaker: Marbella

dialogue.utterance: i love it, i think it is the best
dialogue.speaker: Josanne

dialogue.utterance: What I think is interesting is that it was, and still is, always changing and developing, adapting. For instance, it changed with the social and economic changes over the centuries in Italy, and had big developments with the discovery of the New World, which brought along the intro of potatoes, tomatoes, bell peppers, maize, sugar beet.. all kinds of stuff, which happened in the 18th century.
dialogue.speaker: Marbella

dialogue.utterance: that is very interesting! so would pizza be considered italian cusine ?
dialogue.speaker: Josanne

dialogue.utterance: Absolutely. It was developed in Naples, Italy, after all. Started with focaccia flat bread during Roman times, and they slowly added toppings to that. The word itself first came around in AD 997 in GAeta and spread to central/southern Italy. Very much Italian cuisine, yes.
dialogue.speaker: Marbella

dialogue.utterance: What is your favorite kind of pizza?
dialogue.speaker: Josanne

dialogue.utterance: Me? I keep it simple, with cheese pizza. You don't need too many toppings, in my opinion. That's why I love Italian cuisine in general, as Italian cooks choose quality of ingredients over elaborate preparation, and they go for simplicity, with a lot of dishes limiting themselves to two, maybe four main ingredients, tops.
dialogue.speaker: Marbella

dialogue.utterance: Sounds good i might have to order one later!
dialogue.speaker: Josanne
